Paul's Journal

Patches, Subversion and Ferite

http://force-elite.com/~chip/patches/

I also moved ccSite to Subversion instead of CVS.

SVN has been working pretty good so far. No real complants.

Been playing alot with Ferite lately. I fixed up some patches to add an Event Class to Ferite. I think i will try embeding Ferite instead of PHP. PHP just has too many problems with multi-threaded code.
